reloadone.file: A file that had a specified command no longer exists!

auth.start: Authorize your Trello account with your Discord here:
auth.fail: The bot owner hasn't supplied an authorization link!

donate.fail: The bot owner hasn't supplied any donation links!

links.github: Here is the link to my source code:

invite.start: Here are the links to invite me to other servers!
invite.fail: The bot owner hasn't supplied any invite links!

serverinvite.start: Join the support server with any of these links!
serverinvite.fail: The bot owner hasn't supplied any support server links!

info.title: Information about {{&username}}
info.faux: This bot is using a modified version of [Faux](https://github.com/Snazzah/Faux).

locale.choose: Type the number of the locale you want to set to.
locale.header: `{{&prefix}}locale setuser [locale]` or `{{&prefix}}locale setserver [locale]` to set locale.
locale.no_guild: You are not running the command in a guild!

trello.self_join: Allow Team Members to Edit and Join

cooldown_msg: This command needs to cool down! *({{seconds}})*

command_permissions.attach: I need the permission `Attach Files` to use this command!
command_permissions.embed: I need the permission `Embed Links` to use this command!
command_permissions.emoji: I need the permission `Use External Emojis` to use this command!
command_permissions.trelloRole: This command requires you to be the server owner or have a role named `Trello`!
command_permissions.elevated: Only the elevated users of the bot can use this command!
command_permissions.auth:
You haven't authorized your Trello account with Discord!
Authorize with the `{{&cleanPrefix}}auth` command!
command_permissions.selectedBoard:
There is no board selected!
Select a board with the `{{&cleanPrefix}}switch` command!
command_permissions.discordAuth:
You haven't authorized your Trello account with Discord!
Authorize with the `{{&cleanPrefix}}auth` command!

auth.description: Get the auth link to connect your Discord account to your Trello account.

donate.description: Get the donation links for the developer.

github.description: Sends the bot's open source link.

serverinvite.description: Get the invite for the support server.

asynceval.note:
Due to the added async IIFE wrapper in this command, it is necessary to use the return statement to return a result.
e.g. `{{&cleanPrefix}}aeval return 1`

help.description: Shows the help message and gives information on commands.

locale.description: Lets you set the locale for you or the server. Run with no arguments for a list of locales.

prefix.description: Lets you set the prefixes for you or the server.

shardinfo.description: Gives the stats for every shard.

me.description: View information about your Trello account.

switch.description: Selects a board to use for other commands. Use the `{{&cleanPrefix}}boards` command to see what boards you can select.

boards.description: Lists all of the boards you can manage.

board.description: Gets information on the current board.

lists.description: Lists all of the open lists on the current board. You can see the list archive with `{{&cleanPrefix}}listarchive`.

list.description: Lists all cards in that list.

listarchive.description: Lists all the archived lists in the current board.

card.description: Gets information about a specific card.

cardarchive.description: Lists all the archived cards in the current board.

watch.description: Toggle watching a board. If no board is defined, the current board is used.

star.description: Toggles starring a board. If no board is defined, the current board is used. Starred boards will show up at the top of your boards list on Trello.com.

error: An error occurred while processing that command!

trello_response.unauthorized: The last token used has been invalidated or revoked! Reauthorize with the `{{&cleanPrefix}}auth` command!
trello_response.ratelimit: Too many requests are being sent! Try again later!
trello_response.internal: An internal server error has occurred on Trello's end! Try again later!
trello_response.aborted: Trello took too long to send a response! Try again later!

prompt.choose: Type the number of the item you want to use.
prompt.timeout: Your last prompt was timed out.
prompt.no_search: No results came up with that search.

boards.none: You are not assigned to any boards.
boards.gone: This board no longer exists! Switch to another one with `{{&cleanPrefix}}switch`!
boards.choose: Type the number of the board you want to use.

cards.arch_none: This board has no archived cards.
cards.error: I could not get the card's data! Unless someone deleted before the request, this might be an error on Trello's end!
cards.choose: Type the number of the card you want to use.

lists.arch_none: This board has no archived lists.
lists.list_header: Use `{{&cleanPrefix}}card <cardID|cardName>` to get information on a card.
lists.choose: Type the number of the list you want to use.

can_add.zero: You can't add any more prefixes.

prefix.no_arg_server: Provide the prefix you want to set to the server!
prefix.no_arg: Provide the prefix you want to add!
prefix.footer: Prefixes with the üîí icon cannot be removed.
prefix.choose: Type the number of the prefix you want to delete.
prefix.char_limit: Prefixes can not be more than 32 characters!
prefix.limit: You have too many prefixes! Remove at least one to be able to add any more!
prefix.mention: You cannot have mentions in a prefix!
prefix.none: You have no prefixes to remove!

user_mgmt.star_error: The board's star was not found! Try again later!
